      • onRecordingComplete

        public void onRecordingComplete()
        Fired when recording timer expires or the user dismisses the dialog.

      • onRecognitionComplete

        public abstract void onRecognitionComplete(SpeechResult result)
        Fired when audio recording has been committed. No new audio will be recorded after you receive this event.

      • onRecordingCancelled

        public void onRecordingCancelled()
        Fired when audio recording has been canceled. A user can cancel recording by pressing the cancel button.

        Fired when audio recorder throws errors.
